Package playn.core

Removed Classes and Interfaces
AbstractAssets Base Assets implementation shared among platforms.
AbstractAssets.ImageReceiver  
AbstractCanvas A base Canvas implementation shared by all platforms.
AbstractFont Base Font implementation shared among platforms.
AbstractLayer Base Layer implementation shared among platforms (to avoid reinventing the transform logic).
AbstractLayer.Flag  
AbstractLayer.Interaction Used to dispatch pointer/touch/mouse events to layers.
AbstractLayer.Interactor  
AbstractPlatform Implements some common Platform bits.
AbstractSound  
AbstractTextLayout Base TextLayout implementation shared among platforms.
Asserts @deprecated Use stock java assert statement.
AssetWatcher A utility class that helps keep track of image loading.
AssetWatcher.Listener A listener that is notified of asset loading progress and failures.
AsyncImage An interface used by AbstractAssets.
AudioImpl Handles some shared bits for Audio implementations.
AutoClientBundleWithLookup  
CachingAssets An Assets wrapper that caches all loaded images and sounds with no expiration mechanism.
CanvasImage An image that provides a Canvas that allows you to draw directly into the image.
Connection Represents a listener registration and allows unregistration.
Events Defines some shared events.
Events.Flags Defines some information for how event processing may be controlled.
Events.Flags.Impl  
Events.Input The base for all input events.
Events.Input.Impl  
Events.Position The base for all events with a screen position.
Events.Position.Impl  
Events.Util  
Game.Default An implementation of Game that separates game processing into two phases: simulation and interpolation.
GroupLayer GroupLayer creates a Layer hierarchy by maintaining an ordered group of child Layers.
GroupLayer.Clipped A clipped group layer.
GroupLayerImpl Provides implementations for per-platform concrete GroupLayers.
ImageLayer A layer that displays a bitmapped image.
ImmediateLayer Represents a layer that enables direct rendering into the framebuffer.
ImmediateLayer.Clipped An immediate layer that is clipped to a specified bounds.
ImmediateLayer.Renderer Defines a callback that is invoked every frame to render an immediate layer.
InternalTransform Exposes internals of our transform to the graphics backends.
Keyboard.Adapter A Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Keyboard.Event.Impl  
Keyboard.Listener  
Keyboard.TypedEvent.Impl  
KeyboardImpl Handles the common logic for all platform Keyboard implementations.
Layer Layer is the base element for all rendering in PlayN
Layer.HasSize Interface for Layers containing explicit sizes.
Layer.HitTester Used to customize a layer's hit testing mechanism.
Layer.Util Utility class for transforming coordinates between Layers.
LogImpl A common base class for Log implementations.
Mouse.Adapter A Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Mouse.ButtonEvent.Impl  
Mouse.LayerAdapter A LayerListener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Mouse.LayerListener An interface for listening to mouse events that interact with a single layer.
Mouse.Listener An interface for listening to all mouse events.
Mouse.MotionEvent.Impl  
Mouse.WheelEvent.Impl  
MouseImpl Handles the common logic for all platform Mouse implementations.
MouseStub A NOOP mouse service for use on platforms that don't support mouse interaction.
NetImpl An abstract implementation of Net shared by multiple backends.
NetImpl.BinaryResponse  
NetImpl.BuilderImpl  
NetImpl.Header  
NetImpl.ResponseImpl  
NetImpl.StringResponse  
ParentLayer Provides some implementation details needed by Layer.
PlayN The main PlayN interface.
PlayN.ErrorReporter Used to customize top-level error reporting.
PlayN.LifecycleListener Used to receive lifecycle notifications.
Pointer.Adapter A Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Pointer.Event.Impl  
Pointer.Listener  
PointerImpl Handles the common logic for all platform Pointer implementations.
Sound.Silence A sound that does nothing.
StockInternalTransform The default InternalTransform instance, used on non-JavaScript platforms.
SurfaceImage An image that provides a Surface into which you can render.
TextFormat.Alignment Used to align multiline text.
Touch.Adapter A Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Touch.Event.Impl  
Touch.LayerAdapter A LayerListener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Touch.LayerListener An interface for listening to touch events that interact with a single layer.
Touch.Listener An interface for listening to all touch events.
TouchImpl Handles the common logic for all platform Touch implementations.
TouchStub A NOOP touch service for use on platforms that don't support touch interaction.
WatchedAssets An Assets wrapper that tracks the loading status of all asynchronously loaded resources.
 

Added Classes and Interfaces
Canvas.Drawable Facilitates drawing images and image regions to a canvas.
Clock Encapsulates an absolute and delta time.
Event Defines an event abstraction used in various places in PlayN.
Event.Input The base for all input events.
Event.XY The base for all input events with a screen position.
Exec Handles execution of units of code, both on background threads (.invokeAsync) and on the main PlayN game thread (.invokeLater).
Exec.Default A default exec implementation which processes .invokeLater via the frame tick.
GL20 Interface and values for OpenGL ES 2.0, based on the official JOGL GL2ES2 interface.
GL20.Buffers A helper class for bridging between Java arrays and buffers when implementing GL20.
GLBatch A batch manages the delivery of groups of drawing calls to the GPU.
GLProgram Encapsulates a GL vertex and fragment shader program pair.
GLUtil  
Gradient.Config Used to create gradients.
Gradient.Linear Creates a linear gradient fill pattern.
Gradient.Radial Creates a radial gradient fill pattern.
ImageImpl An implementation detail.
ImageImpl.Data Used to provide bitmap data to the abstract image once it's ready.
Input Provides information about user input: mouse, touch, and keyboard.
Keyboard.KeyEvent An event dispatched for key press/release.
Keyboard.KeySlot A slot which only dispatches on KeyEvents.
Keyboard.TypedSlot A slot which only dispatches on TypedEvents.
Mouse.ButtonEvent.Id Enumerates the supported mouse buttons.
Mouse.ButtonSlot A slot which only dispatches on ButtonEvents.
Mouse.Event The base class for all mouse events.
Mouse.MotionSlot A slot which only dispatches on MotionEvents.
Mouse.WheelSlot A slot which only dispatches on WheelEvents.
Net.Header Contains data for an HTTP header.
Net.Response.Binary Used to deliver binary response data.
Platform.Error Used by .reportError.
Platform.Lifecycle Defines the lifecycle events.
Pointer.Event.Kind Enumerates the different kinds of pointer event.
QuadBatch A batch which can render textured quads.
RenderTarget Encapsulates an OpenGL render target (i.e.
Scale Encapsulates a scale factor, provides useful utility methods.
Scale.ScaledResource Used by .getScaledResources.
SoundImpl An implementation detail.
TextBlock Encapsulates a block of multi-line text.
TextBlock.Align Used to align a block of text.
Texture A handle to an OpenGL texture.
Texture.Config Used to configure texture at creation time.
TextureSurface A Surface which renders to a Texture instead of to the default frame buffer.
TexturedBatch A batch that renders textured primitives.
TexturedBatch.Source Provides some standard bits for a shader program that uses a tint and a texture.
Tile Represents a square region of a texture.
TileSource Provides a Tile, potentially asynchronously.
Touch.Event.Kind Enumerates the different kinds of touch event.
TriangleBatch A batch which renders indexed triangles.
TriangleBatch.Source The source for the stock triangle batch shader program.
UniformQuadBatch A batch which renders quads by stuffing them into a big(ish) GLSL uniform variable.
UniformQuadBatch.Source The source for the stock quad batch shader program.
 

Changed Classes and Interfaces
Assets Fetches and returns assets.
Audio Provides audio services, of which there are presently none.
BatchImpl  
Canvas A 2D drawing canvas.
Font Contains metadata for a font.
Game Defines a simple game API.
Gradient A gradient fill pattern created by Canvas.createGradient.
Graphics Provides access to graphics information and services.
Image Bitmapped image data.
Image.Region A region of an image which can be rendered to Canvases and turned into a texture (which is a Tile of the original image's texture).
Json.Array Represents a parsed JSON array as a simple {@code int->value} map.
Json.Object Represents a parsed JSON object as a simple {@code string->value} map.
Keyboard Defines and dispatches keyboard events.
Keyboard.Event The base class for all keyboard events.
Keyboard.TypedEvent An event dispatched when a printable character is typed.
Log Simple PlayN logging interface.
Mouse Defines and dispatches mouse events.
Mouse.ButtonEvent The event dispatched for mouse input.
Mouse.MotionEvent An event dispatched when the mouse is moved.
Mouse.WheelEvent An event dispatched when the mouse wheel is scrolled.
Net PlayN network interface.
Net.Builder Builds a request and allows it to be configured and executed.
Net.Response Communicates an HTTP response to the caller.
Pattern A bitmap fill pattern created by Image.createPattern.
Platform Provides access to all PlayN cross-platform services.
Pointer Abstracts over Mouse and Touch input, providing a least-common-denominator API which tracks a single "pointer" with simple interactions.
Pointer.Event Contains information on a pointer event.
Sound A single sound asset, which can be played, looped, etc.
Sound.Error Represents a sound that failed to load.
StubPlatform A stub implementation of Platform that provides implementations of those services that can be usefully implemented for unit tests, and throws UnsupportedOperationException for the rest.
Surface A surface provides a simple drawing API to a GPU accelerated render target.
TextFormat Contains info for laying out and drawing single- or multi-line text to a Canvas.
TextLayout Contains metrics and metadata for a laid out body of text.
Tint Tinting related utility methods.
Touch Defines and dispatches touch events.
Touch.Event Contains information on a touch event.
